mapper.insert: insert into sys_page_function(add_time, name, status, _key, page_id) values(#{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{name}, #{status}, #{key}, #{pageId})
mapper.select: select id, add_time, name, status, _key, page_id from sys_page_function where id = #{id};
select id, add_time, name, status, _key, page_id from sys_page_function;
